name: Drinkbox Vita Collection
description:
The complete set of Drinkbox Studios PS Vita classics, together at last! Includes:

Severed:
Take control of a one-armed heroine named Sasha, wielding a living sword on her journey through a nightmare world in search of her family. Swipe-based touch controls will let you solve puzzles, find secrets, and do battle with a host of disturbing monsters.

Guacamelee! and all Guacamelee! DLC:
Guacamelee! is an award winning Metroid-vania style action platformer set in a magical Mexican-inspired world. Guacamelee! builds upon the classic open-world Metroid-vania style of games by adding a strong melee combat component, a new dimension-switching mechanic, and cooperative same screen multiplayer for the entire story.

Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack:
Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack is a sci-fi puzzle-platformer of CATACLYSMIC proportions. You’re a Blob with mutant powers and an insatiable appetite… and you’ve escaped into the world. Consume Everything. Regret Nothing.
